title: Bleed
description: Cause a stabilized creature to resume dying.

title: Create Water
description: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

title: Detect Magic
description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

title: Detect Poison
description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

title: Guidance
description: +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

title: Light
description: Object shines like a torch.

title: Mending
description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

title: Purify Food and Drink
description: Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

title: Resistance
description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

title: Spark
description: Ignites flammable objects.

title: Stabilize
description: Cause a dying creature to stabilize.

title: Virtue
description: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

title: Abundant Ammunition
description: Replaces nonmagical ammunition every round.

title: Air Bubble
description: Creates a small pocket of air around your head or an object.

title: Ant Haul
description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

title: Bane
description: Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

title: Bless
description: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

title: Bless Water
description: Makes holy water.

title: Blessing of the Watch
description: Like bless, except it lasts 1 hour per level instead of 1 minute per level and only working in the caster’s home city, specifically referring to areas under the jurisdiction of the city watch.

title: Burning Disarm
description: A metal object instantly becomes red hot possibly causing the wielder to drop it or take damage.

title: Cause Fear
description: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

title: Command
description: One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

title: Compel Hostility
description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

title: Comprehend Languages
description: You understand all spoken and written languages.

title: Cure Light Wounds
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

title: Curse Water
description: Makes unholy water.

title: Dancing Lantern
description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

title: Deathwatch
description: Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

title: Decompose Corpse
description: Turn corpse into clean skeleton.

title: Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

title: Detect Charm
description: Detect strength and location of charms, compulsions, and possession auras on creatures in the area.

title: Detect the Faithful
description: You can detect other worshipers of your deity.

title: Detect Undead
description: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

title: Divine Favor
description: You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

title: Diagnose Disease
description: Detect and identify diseases.

title: Doom
description: One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

title: Dream Feast
description: Dream of a rich feast and when you awake, you are sated as if you ate and drank a nutritious meal.

title: Endure Elements
description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

title: Entropic Shield
description: Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.

title: Forbid Action
description: Target obeys your command to not do something.

title: Hide from Undead
description: Undead can't perceive one subject/level.

title: Infernal Healing
description: Touch a creature with devils blood, giving it fast healing 1.

title: Inflict Light Wounds
description: Touch deals 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

title: Know the Enemy
description: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.

title: Liberating Command
description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

title: Magic Stone
description: Three stones gain +1 on attack, deal 1d6 +1 damage.

title: Magic Weapon
description: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

title: Moment of Greatness
description: Doubles a morale bonus.

title: Murderous Command
description: Target is compelled to kill its ally.

title: Obscuring Mist
description: Fog surrounds you.

title: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

title: Ray of Sickening
description: Ray makes the subject sickened.

title: Reinforce Armaments
description: Temporarily mitigates the fragile quality in targeted weapon or armor.

title: Remove Fear
description: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

title: Remove Sickness
description: Suppress disease, nausea, and the sickened condition.

title: Restore Corpse
description: Skeletal corpse grows flesh.

title: Sanctify Corpse
description: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.

title: Sanctuary
description: Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.

title: Spiked Armor
description: Suit of armor becomes covered in iron spikes.

title: Shield of Faith
description: Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

title: Summon Minor Monster
description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

title: Summon Monster I
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Swallow Your Fear
description: Grants +2 morale bonus to Str and Con, +1 morale bonus to Will saves, and -2 penalty to AC to subjects suffering from afear effect. Prevents frightened subject from running.

title: Tap Inner Beauty
description: You gain a +2 insight bonus on all Charisma ability checks and Charisma-based skill checks.

title: Unbreakable Heart
description: Target gains a +4 bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects that rely on negative emotions.

title: Admonishing Ray
description: You fire one nonlethal force ray plus one additional ray for every four levels (maximum three rays). Each ray deals 4d6 points of nonlethal damage.

title: Aid
description: +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

title: Align Weapon
description: Weapon becomes good, evil, lawful, or chaotic.

title: Ancestral Communion
description: You contact your ancestors to bolster your own knowledge.

title: Animate Dead, Lesser
description: Create one skeleton or zombie.

title: Ant Haul, Communal
description: As ant haul, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Arrow of Law
description: Harm and possibly daze chaotic creatures.

title: Augury
description: Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

title: Bear's Endurance
description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

title: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
description: Grant a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

title: Blessing of Courage and Life
description: +2 on saves vs. fear and death.

title: Boiling Blood
description: Targets take fire damage; orcs get +2 Strength.

title: Book Ward
description: As protection from energy, except lasting 1 day/level instead of 10 minutes per level and that the spell only protects against acid and fire damage (and while energy protection remains, the item is also completely waterproof).

title: Bull's Strength
description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

title: Calm Emotions
description: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

title: Compassionate Ally
description: Target is compelled to help injured ally.

title: Consecrate
description: Fills area with positive energy, weakening undead.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

title: Darkness
description: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

title: Deadeye's Arrow
description: You create an arrow made of crackling electricity, which you may fire as a weapon or use as a glowing beacon.

title: Death Knell
description: Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.

title: Deathwine
description: Turn a healing potion into a pool that does not heal but increases the caster level of the next necromancy spell you cast.

title: Defending Bone
description: You animate a bone which gives you damage reduction 5/bludgeoning.

title: Delay Pain
description: Ignore pain for 1 hour/level.

title: Delay Poison
description: Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.

title: Desecrate
description: Fills area with negative energy, making undead stronger.

title: Disfiguring Touch
description: Target becomes disfigured.

title: Dread Bolt
description: Harm and possibly sicken good creatures.

title: Eagle's Splendor
description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

title: Effortless Armor
description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

title: Endure Elements, Communal
description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Enthrall
description: Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

title: Find Traps
description: Notice traps as a rogue does.

title: Gentle Repose
description: Preserves one corpse.

title: Ghostbane Dirge
description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

title: Grace
description: Movement doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity.

title: Heroic Fortune
description: The target gains 1 temporary hero point.

title: Hold Person
description: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

title: Imbue with Aura
description: Target emulates your cleric aura.

title: Inflict Moderate Wounds
description: Touch attack, 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

title: Instant Armor
description: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

title: Instrument of Agony
description: Weapon exudes divine fury, granting a bonus on Intimidate checks.

title: Magic Siege Engine
description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

title: Make Whole
description: Repairs an object.

title: Masterwork Transformation
description: Make a normal item into a masterwork one.

title: Owl's Wisdom
description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

title: Pilfering Hand
description: You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.

title: Protection from Chaos, Communal
description: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protection from Evil, Communal
description: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protection from Good, Communal
description: As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protection from Law, Communal
description: As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Protective Penumbra
description: Shadow protects the target from light.

title: Reinforce Armaments, Communal
description: As reinforce armaments, but you may divide the duration among objects touched.

title: Remove Paralysis
description: Frees creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

title: Resist Energy
description: Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.

title: Restoration, Lesser
description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

title: Returning Weapon
description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

title: Shard of Chaos
description: Harm and possibly slow lawful creatures.

title: Share Language
description: Subject understands chosen language.

title: Shatter
description: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

title: Shield Other
description: You take half of subject's damage.

title: Silence
description: Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.

title: Soothing Word
description: Reduces effects of multiple conditions on target.

title: Sound Burst
description: Deals 1d8 sonic damage to subjects; may stun them.

title: Spear of Purity
description: Harm and possibly blind evil creatures.

title: Spiritual Weapon
description: Magic weapon attacks on its own.

title: Staggering Fall
description: Cause additional damage to a falling creature.

title: Status
description: Monitors condition, position of allies.

title: Summon Monster II
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Surmount Affliction
description: Temporarily suppress one condition.

title: Undetectable Alignment
description: Conceals alignment for 24 hours.

title: Weapon of Awe
description: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

title: Web Shelter
description: Create a comfortable shelter made of webbing.

title: Zone of Truth
description: Subjects within range cannot lie.

title: Agonize
description: Pain encourages an outsider to obey you.

title: Animate Dead
description: Creates undead skeletons and zombies.

title: Archon's Aura
description: Aura penalizes enemy attacks and AC.

title: Badger's Ferocity
description: Weapons are keen while you concentrate.

title: Bestow Curse
description: –6 to an ability score; –4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

title: Blessing of the Mole
description: 1 ally/level gains darkvision and a +2 Stealth bonus.

title: Blindness/Deafness
description: Makes subject blinded or deafened.

title: Blood Biography
description: Learn about a creature with its blood.

title: Chain of Perdition
description: Creates a floating chain of force.

title: Channel the Gift
description: Channel magical power into target to fuel their spellcasting. The next 3rd level or lower spell target casts does not expend a spell slot; instead you use your spell slot to power their spell.

title: Channel Vigor
description: You gain either a +4 competence bonus on Knowledge, Perception checks and ranged attack rolls, or, you gain the benefits of the haste spell, or, you gain a +6 competence bonus on Will saving throws and Bluff and Intimidate checks, or, you gain a +6 competence bonus on Fortitude saving throws and Concentration checks.

title: Contagion
description: Infects subject with chosen disease.

title: Continual Flame
description: Makes a permanent, heatless light.

title: Create Food and Water
description: Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

title: Cure Serious Wounds
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

title: Daybreak Arrow
description: Targeted ammunition exudes radiant energy.

title: Daylight
description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

title: Deadly Juggernaut
description: Your might increases with every kill you make.

title: Deeper Darkness
description: Object sheds supernatural shadow in 60-ft. radius.

title: Delay Poison, Communal
description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Discovery Torch
description: Touched object emanates bright light, granting Perception and Sense Motive bonuses.

title: Dispel Magic
description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

title: Elemental Speech
description: You can speak with elementals and some creatures.

title: Enter Image
description: Transfers your consciousness to an object bearing your likeness.

title: Glyph of Warding
description: Inscription harms those who pass it.

title: Guiding Star
description: Know approximate distance from where you cast this spell.

title: Helping Hand
description: Ghostly hand leads subject to you.

title: Inflict Serious Wounds
description: Touch attack, 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

title: Invisibility Purge
description: Dispels invisibility within 5 ft./level.

title: Ki Leech
description: Add to your ki pool when you critically hit.

title: Locate Object
description: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

title: Lover's Vengeance
description: You inspire yourself or a lover to a vengeful rage against a chosen enemy.

title: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

title: Magic Vestment
description: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement bonus per four levels.

title: Meld into Stone
description: You and your gear merge with stone.

title: Nap Stack
description: Subjects only need 2 hours for a night’s sleep, and can sleep even longer for more benefits.

title: Obscure Object
description: Masks object against scrying.

title: Prayer
description: Allies get +1 bonus on most rolls, enemies –1 penalty.

title: Protection from Energy
description: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

title: Remove Blindness/Deafness
description: Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.

title: Remove Curse
description: Frees object or person from curse.

title: Remove Disease
description: Cures all diseases affecting subject.

title: Resist Energy, Communal
description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Returning weapon. Communal
description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

title: Sacred Bond
description: Cast touch healing spells from a distance.

title: Sands of Time
description: Target temporarily ages.

title: Searing Light
description: Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage (more against undead).

title: Severed Fate
description: A target becomes shaken and can not use hero points for 10 minutes per level.

title: Share Language, Communal
description: As share language, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Speak with Dead
description: Corpse answers one question/two levels.

title: Stone Shape
description: Sculpts stone into any shape.

title: Summon Monster III
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Symbol of Healing
description: Triggered rune heals living creatures.

title: Unravel Destiny
description: A target suffers penalties to checks depending on how many hero points it has, and takes damage if it uses them.

title: Vision of Hell
description: Illusory hellscape makes creatures shaken.

title: Water Breathing
description: Subjects can breathe underwater.

title: Water Walk
description: Subject treads on water as if solid.

title: Waters of Maddening
description: Create a more potent unholy water.

title: Wind Wall
description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

title: Wrathful Mantle
description: Subject gets +1/four levels on all saves.

title: Air Walk
description: Subject treads on air as if solid (climb or descend at 45-degree angle).

title: Ancestral Gift
description: A ghostly ancestor appears and gives you a magic weapon, which you may use as if you were proficient in it.

title: Aura of Doom
description: Creatures in your aura become shaken.

title: Blessing of Fervor
description: Gives allies a choice of benefits.

title: Blood Crow Strike
description: Unarmed strikes create crows that deal fire and negative energy damage.

title: Chaos Hammer
description: Harms and slows lawful creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

title: Control Summoned Creature
description: Direct a summoned monster as if you had summoned it.

title: Control Water
description: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

title: Cure Critical Wounds
description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

title: Death Ward
description: Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

title: Debilitating Portent
description: Inf licts an ill fate on a creature, halving its damage when it attacks or casts a spell.

title: Dimensional Anchor
description: Bars extradimensional movement.

title: Discern Lies
description: Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

title: Dismissal
description: Forces a creature to return to native plane.

title: Divination
description: Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

title: Divine Power
description: You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level.

title: Fleshworm Infestation
description: Worms deal hp and Dex damage.

title: Freedom of Movement
description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to movement.

title: Giant Vermin
description: Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

title: Holy Smite
description: Harms and possibly blinds evil creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

title: Imbue with Spell Ability
description: Transfer spells to subject.

title: Infernal Healing, Greater
description: Touch a creature with devils blood, giving it fast healing 4.

title: Inflict Critical Wounds
description: Touch attack, 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

title: Magic Weapon, Greater
description: Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).

title: Neutralize Poison
description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

title: Order's Wrath
description: Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

title: Plague Carrier
description: Target's attacks carry filth fever.

title: Planar Adaptation
description: Resist harmful effects of other plane.

title: Planar Ally, Lesser
description: Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

title: Poison
description: Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

title: Protection from Energy, Communal
description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Repel Vermin
description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

title: Rest Eternal
description: Dead creature cannot be revived.

title: Restoration
description: Restores level and ability score drains.

title: Ride the Waves
description: Target can breathe water and swim.

title: Sending
description: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

title: Shield of Dawn
description: Creatures that strike you take 1d6 +1/level fire damage.

title: Soothe Construct
description: Reduce the berserk chance of a construct.

title: Spell Immunity
description: Subject is immune to one spell per 4 levels.

title: Spiritual Ally
description: Creates a divine ally to aid you.

title: Spit Venom
description: Spit blinding black adder venom.

title: Summon Accuser
description: Summons a single accuser devil from Hell to do your bidding.

title: Summon Monster IV
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Summoner Conduit
description: The target takes damage whenever its summoned creature does.

title: Symbol of Revelation
description: Triggered symbol reveals illusions.

title: Symbol of Slowing
description: Triggered rune slows creatures.

title: Terrible Remorse
description: Creature is compelled to harm itself.

title: Tongues
description: Speak and understand any language.

title: Unholy Blight
description: Harms and sickens good creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

title: Water Walk, Communal
description: As water walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Air Walk, Communal
description: As air walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Ancestral Memory
description: Gain insight into current situation.

title: Astral Projection, Lesser
description: Limited astral travel.

title: Atonement
description: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject and reverses magical alignment change.

title: Boneshatter
description: The target’s bones or exoskeleton shiver and splinter, dealing 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) to the target, who is also exhausted for 1 minute per caster level from the pain and exertion of the transformation.

title: Break Enchantment
description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

title: Breath of Life
description: Cures 5d8 damage + 1/level and restores life to recently slain creatures.

title: Burst of Glory
description: Targets in the area gain a +1 sacred bonus on attack rolls and saves against fear effects, plus 1 temporary hit point percaster level (maximum +20).

title: Cleanse
description: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +25) and also removes several afflictions.

title: Command, Greater
description: As command, but affects one subject/level.

title: Commune
description: Deity answers one yes-or-no question/level.

title: Contagion, Greater
description: Infect a subject with a magical disease.

title: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Curse of Magic Negation
description: Target gains the negated spellblight.

title: Curse, Major
description: As bestow curse, but harder to remove.

title: Dispel Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
description: +4 bonus against attacks.

title: Disrupting Weapon
description: Melee weapon destroys undead.

title: Fickle Winds
description: Wind walls selectively block attacks.

title: Flame Strike
description: Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

title: Forbid Action, Greater
description: As forbid action, but 1 creature/level.

title: Ghostbane Dirge, Mass
description: As ghostbane dirge, but affects multiple creatures.

title: Hallow
description: Designates location as holy.

title: Heroic Fortune, Mass
description: As heroic fortune, except it affects more targets.

title: Holy Ice
description: Create wall or javelins of frozen holy water.

title: Inflict Light Wounds, Mass
description: Deals 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Insect Plague
description: Wasp swarms attack creatures.

title: Life Bubble
description: Protects creatures from environment.

title: Magic Siege Engine, Greater
description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls for every four caster levels.

title: Mark of Justice
description: Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

title: Pillar of Life
description: Created pillar heals 2d8 +1/level (max +20)

title: Plane Shift
description: As many as 8 subjects travel to another plane.

title: Raise Dead
description: Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

title: Rapid Repair
description: Construct gains fast healing 5.

title: Reprobation
description: Marked target is shunned by your religion.

title: Righteous Might
description: Your size increases, and you gain bonuses in combat.

title: Scrying
description: Spies on subject from a distance.

title: Serenity
description: Peaceful feelings harm those attempting violence.

title: Slay Living
description: Touch attack deals 12d6 + 1 per level.

title: Smite Abomination
description: You emulate some of the powers of a paladin smiting undead.

title: Snake Staff
description: Transforms staff or other wood into snakes to fight for you.

title: Spell Immunity, Communal
description: As spell immunity, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Spell Resistance
description: Subject gains SR 12 + level.

title: Summon Infernal Host
description: Summon host devils.

title: Summon Monster V
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Symbol of Pain
description: Triggered rune wracks nearby creatures with pain.

title: Symbol of Scrying
description: Triggered rune activates scrying sensor.

title: Symbol of Striking
description: As symbol of death, but fills a 5-foot square.

title: Symbol of Sleep
description: Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

title: Tongues, Communal
description: As tongues, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Treasure Stitching
description: Objects on cloth become embroidered.

title: True Seeing
description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

title: Undeath Ward
description: You create a pale silver barrier that repels undead.

title: Unhallow
description: Designates location as unholy.

title: Unholy Ice
description: Create wall or javelins of frozen unholy water.

title: Wall of Stone
description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

title: Animate Objects
description: Objects attack your foes.

title: Antilife Shell
description: 10-ft.-radius field hedges out living creatures.

title: Banishment
description: Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

title: Bear's Endurance, Mass
description: As bear's endurance, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Blade Barrier
description: Wall of blades deals 1d6/level damage.

title: Bloodsworn Retribution
description: Cut yourself and swear an oath of retribution on your own blood. Any attack, save, or check related to the oath grants you a morale bonus to that roll equal to the number of hit points of damage you sacrificed divided by 5.

title: Bull's Strength, Mass
description: As bull's strength, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Cold Ice Strike
description: Cone of ice slivers deals 1d6 cold/level.

title: Create Undead
description: Create ghasts, ghouls, mohrgs, or mummies.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Dispel Magic, Greater
description: As dispel magic, but with multiple targets.

title: Dust Form
description: You become an incorporeal creature of dust for a short period of time.

title: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
description: As eagle's splendor, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Epidemic
description: Infect a subject with a highly contagious disease.

title: Find the Path
description: Shows most direct way to a location.

title: Forbiddance
description: Blocks planar travel, damages creatures of different alignment.

title: Geas/Quest
description: As lesser geas, but affects any creature.

title: Glyph of Warding, Greater
description: As glyph of warding, but up to 10d8 damage or 6th-level spell.

title: Harm
description: Deals 10 points/level damage to target.

title: Heal
description: Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

title: Hellfire Ray
description: A blast of hellfire deals 1d6 damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) to the target (half fire damage half unholy damage.) If a creature is killed by this damage it must make a Will save or be damned to Hell.

title: Heroes' Feast
description: Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

title: Inflict Moderate Wounds, Mass
description: Deals 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Joyful Rapture
description: Negate harmful emotions.

title: Owl's Wisdom, Mass
description: As owl's wisdom, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Plague Storm
description: Cloud infects creatures like contagion.

title: Planar Adaptation, Mass
description: As planar adaptation, but affects multiple creatures.

title: Planar Ally
description: As lesser planar ally, but up to 12 HD.

title: Summon Monster VI
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Symbol of Fear
description: Triggered rune panics nearby creatures.

title: Symbol of Persuasion
description: Triggered rune charms nearby creatures.

title: Symbol of Sealing
description: Creates triggered wall of force.

title: Undeath to Death
description: Destroys 1d4 HD/level undead (max. 20d4).

title: Wind Walk
description: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

title: Word of Recall
description: Teleports you back to designated place.

title: Bestow Grace of the Champion
description: Target gains paladin abilities for 1 round/level.

title: Blasphemy
description: Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes nonevil subjects.

title: Circle of Clarity
description: Emanation hampers illusions and stealth.

title: Control Weather
description: Changes weather in local area.

title: Create Demiplane, Lesser
description: Create your own demiplane.

title: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Destruction
description: Kills subject and destroys remains.

title: Dictum
description: Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.

title: Ethereal Jaunt
description: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

title: Holy Word
description: Kills, paralyzes, blinds, or deafens nongood subjects.

title: Inflict Serious Wounds, Mass
description: Deals 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Jolting Portent
description: You inflict a vengeful fate on a creature, dealing electricity damage each time it attacks or casts a spell.

title: Lunar Veil
description: Dispel light and revert lycanthropes.

title: Refuge
description: Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

title: Regenerate
description: Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

title: Repulsion
description: Creatures can't approach you.

title: Restoration, Greater
description: As restoration, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

title: Resurrection
description: Fully restore dead subject.

title: Scrying, Greater
description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

title: Summon Monster VII
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Symbol of Stunning
description: Triggered rune stuns nearby creatures.

title: Symbol of Weakness
description: Triggered rune weakens nearby creatures.

title: Vision of Doom
description: As nightmare plus affect target with additional targeted spell of 6th level or lower that does not deal hp damage to be delivered when the target wakes at the nightmare's conclusion.

title: Waves of Ecstasy
description: Pleasure stuns and staggers creatures.

title: Word of Chaos
description: Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.

title: Antimagic Field
description: Negates magic within 10 ft.

title: Call Construct
description: Summon your golem to you.

title: Cloak of Chaos
description: +4 deflection bonus to AC, +4 resistance bonus to saves, and SR 25 against lawful spells.

title: Create Demiplane
description: As lesser create demiplane, but larger and with planar traits.

title: Create Greater Undead
description: Create shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.

title: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level for many creatures.

title: Dimensional Lock
description: Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

title: Discern Location
description: Reveals exact location of creature or object.

title: Earthquake
description: Intense tremor shakes 80-ft. radius.

title: Euphoric Tranquility
description: Makes a single creature peaceful and friendly.

title: Fire Storm
description: Deals 1d6/level fire damage.

title: Frightful Aspect
description: You take on a terrifying, Large-sized form of yourself and emit an aura that causes creatures to become shaken orfrightened.

title: Holy Aura
description: +4 deflection bonus to AC, +4 resistance bonus to saves, and SR 25 against evil spells.

title: Inflict Critical Wounds, Mass
description: Deals 4d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Orb of the Void
description: Sphere inflicts negative levels.

title: Planar Ally, Greater
description: As lesser planar ally, but up to 18 HD.

title: Rift of Ruin
description: Tears a rift in reality, creating an extra-dimensional hole with a depth of 60 feet.

title: Shield of Law
description: +4 deflection bonus to AC, +4 resistance bonus to saves, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

title: Spell Immunity, Greater
description: As spell immunity, but up to 8th-level spells.

title: Stormbolts
description: 1d8 damage/level (max 20d8) to targets.

title: Summon Monster VIII
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Symbol of Death
description: Triggered rune kills nearby creatures.

title: Symbol of Insanity
description: Triggered rune renders nearby creatures insane.

title: Unholy Aura
description: +4 deflection bonus to AC, +4 resistance bonus to saves, and SR 25 against good spells.

title: Astral Projection
description: Projects you and others onto Astral Plane.

title: Canopic Conversion
description: Eviscerates the target, drawing forth his life essence as well as his internal organs, inflicting 1d6 hit points of damage percaster level (maximum 20d6). If this kills the target, the spell pulls his organs into a set of 4 canopic jars and seals them; creating an Osirion mummy 1d4 rounds later.

title: Create Demiplane, Greater
description: As create demiplane, but larger and with more planar traits.

title: Cursed Earth
description: Plants die, living creatures catch diseases, or dead creatures rise as zombies.

title: Energy Drain
description: Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

title: Etherealness
description: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions.

title: Gate
description: Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

title: Heal, Mass
description: As heal, but affects 1 subject/level.

title: Implosion
description: Inflict 10 damage/level to one creature/round.

title: Interplanetary Teleport
description: Teleport to another planet.

title: Miracle
description: Requests a deity's intercession.

title: Overwhelming Presence
description: Creatures bow before you as if you were divine.

title: Polar Midnight
description: Cold darkness paralyzes and deals damage.

title: Soul Bind
description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

title: Spell Immunity, Greater Communal
description: As greater spell immunity, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Storm of Vengeance
description: Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.

title: Summon Monster IX
description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

title: Symbol of Strife
description: Triggered rune makes creatures attack.

title: Symbol of Vulnerability
description: Triggered rune gives penalties.

title: True Resurrection
description: As resurrection, plus remains aren't needed.

title: Winds of Vengeance
description: Grants flight; attack with wind.

title: Wooden Phalanx
description: Creates 1d4+2 temporary wood golems to fight for you.
